stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Attendance matters. All his talking points on Canvas, but his lectures are far more informative then the power points. Midterm, Final, and 2 papers. He is crystal clear on the paper reqs. and gives study guides for the exams. Don\'t be lazy, do the assignments and participate in class and you will get an A. Swears like a sailor so lectures are funny

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Mr. Downey is an awesome and funny teacher. He will keep you the whole class, but the way he teaches is outstanding, and learned a lot from this class. Only 2 essays and two tests the whole class, and wont even use your book, all you need is the notes. Highly recommended! Best teacher at brookdale!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Prof. Downey is the man! He is funny, a pleasure to be around and overall a chill professor. He grades fairly and offers help if needed. With that said this class won\'t be a breeze, you have to put the effort in but he is worth it. His teaching methods work, I stayed interested through out the class. If I could I would take history with him again!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: He isn\'t necessary easy but is far and unique in his teaching methods. Will keep you interested during lectures! He is enthusiastic and not afraid to be a little "politically incorrect" in his actions and what he says. He grades and teaches fairly, and tries to make sure you are prepared for exams, ect but of course you also have to put the work in.

comments: prof. Downey is a great teacher and clearly very passionate about what he does. He makes the class very fun and loves to use sports analogies. As long as you attend lectures and look over your notes for tests, your sure to get an A.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Prof Downey is awesome. I hate history classes but his animation, jokes and ability to explain information was awesome. He does not mince words and is very honest about what he thinks and what happened in history-no sugar coating here. He is fun and a fair grader. Tests are hard but thats possibly because I suck at history.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: He is a great teacher. He takes the subjects that we have been learning about since middle school and adds in the good stuff, the details you never knew. His tests were easy if you put in the effort and studied. Very nice guy and very much on top of what he is doing. I was in his 10 week 135 class and really enjoyed it. Congrats on the baby! JP

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: A really interesting and great teacher! He definetly knows his material and is not one sided teaching it at all. Makes an effort to involve students and incorporate material into modern references. He definetly makes you think about the material and is very lenient with material. No real homework, gives papers way in advance, and is very helpful.
